com.storytron.swat.tree

Class Tree

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • com.storytron.swat.tree.Tree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicTree

    public class Tree
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    This is an implementation of a tree display. It was needed when the nodes of the script tree started changing its size when they toggled from expanded to collapsed state. JTree did not handled this properly by default and there were not visible way of fixing this.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Tree.NodeEntry
      This utility class holds a node and its boundings as shown in screen in the tree coordinate space.

      • setRowHeight

        public void setRowHeight(int rowHeight)
        The tree guarantees this height to be the one used for nodes. If set to zero the height of the component returned by the renderer is used instead. The height is set to zero by default.

      • getRowHeight

        public int getRowHeight()
        Returns the height used for drawing tree nodes (if setted with setRowHeight(int)).

        public void getTopLeftCorner(TNode node,
                             java.awt.Point p)
        Gets the top left corner of a visible node. If the given node is not visible the top left corner of the last node is returned

      • unfold

        public void unfold()
        Expands all the tree nodes.

      • unfold

        public void unfold(TNode node)
        Expands a tree nodes and all of its descendants.

      • scrollNodeToVisible

        public void scrollNodeToVisible(TNode node)
        Makes visible a given node. It expands the path to the node if it is not visible and also scrolls properly the scrollable containers of the tree.

      • setSelectedNode

        public void setSelectedNode(TNode selectedNode)
        Sets the selected node.

                        TNode n,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int w,
                        int h)
        Event called whenever a node is clicked. x, y, w and h are the node bounds in the tree coordinate space.
